definition: to join things together by fixing them in place at one or more points/to nail/to pin/to staple/to sew on
nail/to follow closely/to keep at sb (to do sth)/variant of 盯[ding1]

pinyin: nei4 liu4 jiao3 yuan2 zhu4 tou2 luo2 ding1

sentences.english: Use percussive drill to enlarge holes. Install expansion plugs and secure with wood screws.
sentences.chinese: 直接塞上膨胀塞并用75MM的木螺钉固定。

sentences.english: The crew unscrewed the screws from the sewing-machine and chewed them.
sentences.chinese: 海员们从缝纫机上旋下螺钉并咀嚼它们。

sentences.english: The pothole fractured a bolt on the axle.
sentences.chinese: 壶穴使车轴上的一只螺钉破碎。

sentences.english: Install screws attaching seat function switch to seat trim panel.
sentences.chinese: 安装连接座椅功能开关至座椅饰板的螺钉。

sentences.english: Side view of wing screw with adjustable thread length.
sentences.chinese: 螺纹长度可调整的翼形螺钉的侧面图。

sentences.english: They are easy to pick out because they do not have as sharp a point as wood screws do.
sentences.chinese: 他们是容易辨认，因为他们没有一点为削木螺钉。

sentences.english: CKP sensor rotor plate is fitted to crankshaft counterweight No. 1 by pin and screws.
sentences.chinese: 转子板的CKP传感器安装在曲轴销和螺钉重第一。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze biomechanical property of three methods of sacral screw.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究三种骶骨螺钉植入法的生物力学性能。

sentences.english: The curved screw at the femoral calcar was found in the experimental side.
sentences.chinese: 有一只山羊实验侧螺纹钉出现弯曲，为股骨距处螺钉。

sentences.english: Variation of the screw angle results in reduction of purchase of the locking interface, or cross-threading the head.
sentences.chinese: 螺钉角度的变异会致使锁定界面的减少或跨螺纹的头。

sentences.english: The risk of ICA injury from C1 screws is unknown.
sentences.chinese: C1螺钉固定颈内动脉的危险还不知道。

sentences.english: The full screw cap results in the tube being able to stand independently in the kitchen cupboard.
sentences.chinese: 完整的螺钉内能够站在厨柜独立管帽的结果。

sentences.english: The Trauson Cannulated Screws are available in a wide range of sizes for varied clinical situations.
sentences.chinese: 创生中空螺钉规格齐全，以适应不同的临床需要。

sentences.english: Fix through flashing into battens using specified screws.
sentences.chinese: 采用特定螺钉通过收边泛水和挂瓦条连接固定。

sentences.english: Hexalobular socket countersunk head tapping screws.
They include front located gain controls, XLR and screw terminal connectors.
sentences.chinese: 他们包括前设增益控制，XLR和螺钉终端连接器。

definition: bolt (male component of nut and bolt)/screw
nut (female component of nut and bolt)
nut (female component of nut and bolt)
to spread litter in a cowshed, pigsty etc
to bore a hole/to drill/drilled hole
